mapper.select: SELECT t1.user_id, t1.user_name, t2.monthly_attendance_req_id, t2.target_year_month, t2.monthly_attendance_req_date, t2.status FROM users t1 INNER JOIN monthly_attendance_req t2 on t1.user_id = t2.user_id WHERE t2.status = 1;
SELECT * from monthly_attendance_req where target_year_month = #{target_year_month} AND status = 1 OR 2
mapper.insert: insert into monthly_attendance_req(user_id, target_year_month, monthly_attendance_req_date, status) values(#{userId},#{targetYearMonth},#{monthlyAttendanceReqDate},#{status});
mapper.delete: delete from attendance WHERE attendance.user_id = #{userId} AND attendance_date BETWEEN #{targetDate} AND #{endDate};
